content: this is a great project for beginner crocheters or seasoned crafters looking for small amigurumi to sell at markets i used i love this yarn from hobby lobby finished pig measures 4 in height and 5 in length with worsted weight yarn if you want a larger pig use super bulky yarn with a 6 5mm hook you ll need worsted weight yarn 4 5mm hook polyfil yarn needle 12mm safety eyes
